document_data.name: Bloodhound
document_data.mainbody: '''Bloodhounds''' were a domestic breed of [[dog]].{{Cite dragon/237/Man's Best Friend|19}} They were among the largest breeds of dogs and were quite adept at tracking, to the point that they were primarily utilized for this purpose.

Ecology.Relationships: Bloodhounds sometimes acted as [[favored animal|servants]] of the [[Halfling pantheon|halfling god]] [[Arvoreen]].{{Cite web enhancement/Deity Do's and Don'ts|10}} And members of the [[Fellowship of Stalkers of the Silent Path]] typically had a bloodhound companion.

document_data.History: Around [[1035 DR]],{{Cite adventurers league/Purging the Blood|2}} the [[Hultmark]] family of [[Waterdeep]] owned a pair of [[vampire|vampiric]] bloodhounds. In their [[Hultmark Manor|manor's]] kitchen the family kept a jar of dog treats for them that were infused with blood.<ref>{{Cite adventurers league/Purging the Blood|7}}
document_data.Trivia: A tuft of fur from this breed was needed as a [[material component]] to cast the [[spell]]s ''[[locate creature]]'' and ''[[locate animals or plants]]''.<ref>
